mapper.sql: update cet_project cp left join (select project_id, sum(period) as period from cet_project_plan where project_id=(select project_id from cet_project_plan where id=#{planId})) tmp on cp.id=tmp.project_id set cp.period = tmp.period where cp.id=tmp.project_id;
mapper.update: update cet_project_plan set period=(select sum(period) from cet_plan_course where plan_id=#{planId}) where id=#{planId};
update cet_project_plan set period=(select sum(ctc.period) from cet_train_course ctc, cet_train ct where ctc.train_id=ct.id and ct.plan_id=#{planId}) where id=#{planId};
update cet_project_plan set period=(select sum(period) from cet_discuss where plan_id=#{planId}) where id=#{planId};

update cet_project cp left join (select project_id, sum(period) as period from cet_project_plan where project_id=#{projectId}) tmp on cp.id=tmp.project_id set cp.period = tmp.period where cp.id=#{projectId}

update cet_project cp left join (select project_id, sum(period) as period from cet_train_course where project_id=#{projectId}) tmp on cp.id=tmp.project_id set cp.period = tmp.period where cp.id=#{projectId}

sql.where:
u.id=o.user_id and o.project_id=#{projectId}
and (u.username like #{search} or u.realname like #{search} or u.code like #{search})

mapper.select: select o.* from cet_project_obj o, sys_user_view u
select count(o.id) from cet_project_obj o, sys_user_view u

select sum(ctc.period) from cet_train_obj cto left join cet_train_course ctc on cto.train_course_id=ctc.id where cto.is_finished=1 and ctc.is_online=1 and ctc.project_id=#{projectId} and cto.user_id=#{userId}
mapper.sql:
where o.is_quit=0 and ct.is_deleted=0 and (ct.enroll_status=1 or (ct.enroll_status=0 and now() between start_time and end_time))
and ct.is_finished = #{isFinished}
mapper.select:
select ct.*, cto.user_id, count(cto.id) as course_count from cet_train ct left join cet_train_obj cto on ct.id=cto.train_id and cto.user_id=#{userId} left join cet_project_plan cpp on cpp.id=ct.plan_id left join cet_project_obj o on cpp.project_id= o.project_id and o.user_id=#{userId}
group by cto.user_id order by ct.create_time desc

select cp.* from cet_project cp, cet_project_obj cpo
order by cp.year desc, cp.id desc
select count(cp.id) from cet_project cp, cet_project_obj cpo

select cc.* from cet_course cc
order by sort_order desc
select count(cc.id) from cet_course cc
